Title: Prohibits the sale of certain birds at retail
Summary: Prohibits the sale of birds at retail pet shops; provides exceptions for certain domesticated game birds and other birds including chickens, turkeys, guinea fowl, peafowl and pigeons.
LawCode: Amd ยง753-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of certain birds at retail
